languages.text: "Таинственные ксеносоветники, которым вы доверили управление планетой, внезапно заинтересовались вульгарными верованиями мутантов. Они рекомендуют не подвергать их гонениям, а отселить их в отдельные жилые сектора и вести наблюдение".

"The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."
languages.original_text: "Таинственные ксеносоветники, которым вы доверили управление планетой, внезапно заинтересовались вульгарными верованиями мутантов. Они рекомендуют не подвергать их гонениям, а отселить их в отдельные жилые сектора и вести наблюдение".

traits.locale_text: "The mysterious... advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants's vulgar religious practices. They recommend to not persecute the wretches but to observe them."

"The mysterious... advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants's vulgar religious practices. They recommend to not persecute the wretches but to observe them."

"The mysterious... advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend to not persecute the retches but to observe them."

"The mysterious... advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend to not persecute the retches but to observe them."

"The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."

languages.text: «Los misteriosos asesores xenos a quienes nombró para que supervisaran el planeta han mostrado un interés inesperado por las vulgares prácticas religiosas de los mutantes. Recomiendan no perseguir a estos degenerados sino segregarlos en sectores residenciales separados para observarlos».
languages.original_text: "The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."

traits.locale_text: «Los misteriosos asesores xenos a quienes nombró para que supervisaran el planeta han mostrado un interés inesperado por las vulgares prácticas religiosas de los mutantes. Recomiendan no perseguir a estos degenerados sino segregarlos en sectores residenciales separados para observarlos».

languages.text: « Les mystérieux conseillers xénos que vous avez désignés pour superviser la planète ont montré un intérêt inattendu pour les pratiques religieuses vulgaires des mutants. Au lieu de persécuter ces misérables créatures, ils recommandent de les isoler dans des secteurs résidentiels séparés et de les placer en observation. »
languages.original_text: "The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."

traits.locale_text: « Les mystérieux conseillers xénos que vous avez désignés pour superviser la planète ont montré un intérêt inattendu pour les pratiques religieuses vulgaires des mutants. Au lieu de persécuter ces misérables créatures, ils recommandent de les isoler dans des secteurs résidentiels séparés et de les placer en observation. »

languages.text: “您任命监管该行星的神秘异形，似乎对这些变种人的原始宗教产生了浓厚的兴趣。异形建议您不要处决这些丑恶种，而是建立专门的隔离居住区，对他们进行密切观察。”
languages.original_text: "The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."

traits.locale_text: “您任命监管该行星的神秘异形，似乎对这些变种人的原始宗教产生了浓厚的兴趣。异形建议您不要处决这些丑恶种，而是建立专门的隔离居住区，对他们进行密切观察。”

languages.text: 「あなたがこの惑星を監督するために任命した謎めいた異種族のアドバイザーは、変異体の低俗な宗教的慣習に予想外の関心を示しました。彼らは変異体を迫害するのではなく、居住区を分け、監視下に置くことを勧めました」
languages.original_text: "The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがこの惑星を監督するために任命した謎めいた異種族のアドバイザーは、変異体の低俗な宗教的慣習に予想外の関心を示しました。彼らは変異体を迫害するのではなく、居住区を分け、監視下に置くことを勧めました」

languages.text: "Die mysteriösen Xenosberater, die Ihr ernannt habt, den Planeten zu überwachen, haben ein unerwartetes Interesse an dem vulgären religiösen Praktiken der Mutanten gezeigt. Sie empfehlen, die Speier nicht zu verfolgen, sondern sie in separate Wohnsektoren zu segregieren und unter Beobachtung zu stellen."
languages.original_text: "The mysterious xenos advisors you had appointed to oversee the planet showed unexpected interest in the mutants' vulgar religious practices. They recommend not to persecute the retches but to segregate them into separate residential sectors and put them under observation."

traits.locale_text: "Die mysteriösen Xenosberater, die Ihr ernannt habt, den Planeten zu überwachen, haben ein unerwartetes Interesse an dem vulgären religiösen Praktiken der Mutanten gezeigt. Sie empfehlen, die Speier nicht zu verfolgen, sondern sie in separate Wohnsektoren zu segregieren und unter Beobachtung zu stellen."
